# Vendor Analysis: Corvex.ai

## Overview
A new entrant in the AI cloud space focusing on dedicated supercomputers and high-speed InfiniBand networking.

## Economic & Operational Profile
- **Founded:** ~2024/2025 (Public entry via merger with Movano).
- **Funding:** Raised ~$37M in 2025.
- **Employees:** ~10 - 20 (Early stage).
- **Incidents:** No major outages reported; facilities are NFPA 75 fire-suspension compliant.

## Gaussian Risk Variable
**$\sigma_{risk}$ = 0.68** (High)
*Confidence Interval: [0.58, 0.78]*
Very high risk due to being an early-stage company with limited operational history and small workforce.
